column1: It very  clear  that  by  signing  the said  lease  agreement,  the  Chairman  of the  Kalutara  Urban
Council  has acted outside his authority.
Chief  Revenue  Inspector of the  Defendant  Council,  had  stated  in  his  evidence  that the  File
with the documents marked,  'P1 to  P27',  kept in  the Council  are  missing from the cupboard
and  it is  not available at their Office.  The  Defendant  Council  did  not call  any  witnesses  and
after the written submissions of both parties, the Learned Trial Judge delivered the Judgment
dismissing the action of the Plaintiff. The present appeal preferred against the said Judgment.
